text: FYI: Moxon will be hanging out here while I take a trip to ADX. He just peed a minute ago, and shouldn't need to pee or poop before I get back (~4pm?). He also has a full water bowl and a toy, so should be low maintenance! If by random chance he has a yellow accident, the stain/odor eliminator is on my desk next to a roll of towels. any emergency my cell is 412 657 2075, but I can respond to slack/email too.
(and if he is a problem I can always come get him and bring him to ADX with us)
